Name: Glinting Stellar Core
Description: Material used for breakthrough-level enhancement of weapon. Once the relevant crafting feature is unlocked, collect Glinting Stellar Cores and Throne (Pure Gold), then visit Cassie, the Floating Island Envoy of the Artisan Guild, to upgrade Lv.90 weapons to Lv.100 "Far-Sea" series weapons, which features a special weapon appearance.
Description2:
Its surface shimmers with rippling luster, flowing with light like waves across the sea.
Infused with Engrams and marine energy, it far surpasses terrestrial metals in both conductivity and resilience. Often used in crafting weapons that channel the power of the ocean.
